title: Account Abstraction
description: This project exemplifies the next generation of digital asset management on the Ethereum blockchain by utilizing ERC-4337 Account Abstraction for user authentication.

title: Complete 2 Collect

title: Progressive Web App
description:
My project, Unipass, is a Progressive Web App offering a native-app-like experience, offline capability, and cross-platform accessibility.
How to Install:
- On Android: Open the app in a web browser, tap on the three-dot menu, and select 'Add to Home screen'.
- On iOS: Open the app in Safari, tap the 'Share' button, and then choose 'Add to Home Screen'.
- On Desktop: Open the app in a web browser, and look for a '+' symbol in the address bar or browser options to install.

title: Token Bound Account
description: Unlock the future of digital asset management with our Token-Bound Wallet. This unique solution allows you not only to buy and sell NFTs but also to transfer the entire wallet simply by exchanging a special Account NFT. Effortlessly gift or sell your entire digital portfolio with a single transaction.

title: Card To Canvas
description: Transform your credit card into a key to the NFT universe. With CardToCanvas, purchasing unique digital assets has never been easier. Backed by Paper.xyz technology.

title: Decentralized Token Whitelisting and Messaging DApp
description: Explore a cutting-edge DApp that enables secure token whitelisting, personalized messaging, and easy token claims within the blockchain network. Enhance trust and security in token transfers while fostering an inclusive token economy. Embrace the future of blockchain technology today!
